TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIViewAnimationTransition extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of predefined animated transitions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIViewAnimationTransition CurlDown = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A transition that curls a UIView down from the top.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIViewAnimationTransition CurlUp = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A transition that curls a UIView up from the bottom.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIViewAnimationTransition FlipFromLeft = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A transition that flips a UIView around a vertical axis from left to right. The left moves forward and the right backward.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIViewAnimationTransition FlipFromRight = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A transition that flips a UIView around a vertical axis from right to left The right moves forward and the left backward.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIViewAnimationTransition None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The option for indicating that no transition is specified.
